name: module-federation-project
description: 基于 Rsbuild + Module Federation 的微前端学习项目

scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm run dev:ui-kit" "pnpm run dev:counter" "pnpm run dev:todos" "pnpm run dev:shell"
scripts.build: pnpm run build:ui-kit && pnpm run build:counter && pnpm run build:todos && pnpm run build:shell
scripts.preview: concurrently "pnpm run preview:counter" "pnpm run preview:todos" "pnpm run preview:shell"
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:shell && pnpm run clean:counter && pnpm run clean:todos && pnpm run clean:ui-kit
scripts.clean:shell: pnpm --filter shell exec rm -rf dist node_modules/.cache
scripts.clean:counter: pnpm --filter counter exec rm -rf dist node_modules/.cache
scripts.clean:todos: pnpm --filter todos exec rm -rf dist node_modules/.cache
scripts.clean:ui-kit: pnpm --filter ui-kit exec rm -rf dist node_modules/.cache
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:shell && pnpm run lint:counter && pnpm run lint:todos && pnpm run lint:ui-kit
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm run lint:fix:shell && pnpm run lint:fix:counter && pnpm run lint:fix:todos && pnpm run lint:fix:ui-kit
scripts.type-check: pnpm run type-check:shell && pnpm run type-check:counter && pnpm run type-check:todos && pnpm run type-check:ui-kit

author: leslie <924361501@qq.com>
